Package javanews.gui

Provides windows for use within the application to display information and interact with the user.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Client This class is responsible for the general working environment of the JavaNews application.
SplashScreen Used to provide information to the user while the main components of the application are initialised.
 

Package javanews.gui Description

Provides windows for use within the application to display information and interact with the user. Classes contained directly within this package are independent and do not require any dependencies prior to display. Those classes that have dependencies are located within sub-packages of this package.

Package Specification

None

Related Documentation

None

1.0
